description: Azusa is the granddaughter of a friend of Madoka Mano`s. She is several years younger than Yohko. She wants to train as a mamano hunter under Madoka at the Mano Shrine, but that hasn`t happened yet. She was born in Komoridani, Kisshu. Azusa also has a box which she calls the "Mamono Hunter Starter Kit." This kit contains assorted goods such as toy ghosts, knives, and a mystic reference book entitled "All You Really Need To Know About Hyper-Space and Pan-Dimensional Travel."
name: Kanzaki Azusa
